uchar *  output,
int  olen
) 
 

Derive and export the shared secret (G^Y)^X mod P.

Parameters:
ctx DHM context
output destination buffer
olen must be == ctx->P.len
Returns:
0 if successful, or ERR_DHM_MAKE_PUBLIC_FAILED
